document_data.mainbody:
Sticky Dondo was a thief and fence member of Fetchers Brats and later the Guild in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Dondo was a young human boy with a tan skin tone, light brown eyes, and strawberry blonde hair. He wore a garb dyed with the Guilds green color and had a direct and straight-to-business demeanor.
In the , Sticky Dondo was a part of a street urchin gang led by Osgur "Fetcher" Hallorn. When the man disappeared following a guild war breaking out between Nine-Fingers Keene and the Stone Lord, Fetchers Brats were taken in by the Guild and given shelter in the Guildhall. Sticky Dondo took on the role of leader among the kids, fencing stolen and looted goods to the members of the Guild, and Lil Fezmor kept herself busy, sending clients to Sticky, and masterminding heists.
